title: Console Team response limited today
body: Hey all. It's awesome getting your comments here, and we've added several new items to our backlog because of it. Thanks for caring and helping drive console improvements in Windows -- we all want it to be great someday!

comments.body:
Go, go, go!!
That's nice that finally the windows console/terminal is being rejuvenated! (sadly this should have been done before, starting win7).
Aside, I loved the fact that starting win8 there is some "condrv.sys" that is used (and it makes sense totally when one sees how the console works on MinWin).
